isb:document.h3: MAGNET: Modeling and Analysis of Genetic Networks
isb:document.p: MAGNET is a software suite developed in the laboratory of Hamid Bolouri at the Institute for Systems Biology. In addition, BioTapestry is developed in collaboration with the laboratory of Eric Davidson at Caltech.

p.a: Dizzy: a chemical kinetics stochastic simulation software package written in Java
ISBJava: a Java library for computational biology
BioTapestry: network visualization, documentation, and dissemination
Pointillist: an iterative framework for biological modeling
